p: RNA was extracted from the positive samples which are FMDV O/CHA/1999, A/CHA/2009, and Asia 1/CHA/2005 as well as SVDV provided by China National Foot-and-Mouth Disease Reference Laboratory and blood of healthy pig which was negatively detected by RT-PCR or ELISA for FMDV assay, with a TaKaRa MiniBEST Viral RNA/DNA Extraction Kit (ver. 4.0; Takara Bio, Japan) according to the manufacturer's instructions. After extraction, the RNA was eluted in 30 µL of elution buffer and stored at -70℃ until further use.
